title: TC001-Landing Page Dark Mode Continuity
description: Verify that the landing page displays a continuous dark mode visual experience with no visual breaks or inconsistent color shifts throughout all sections on both desktop and mobile devices.
code:
import asyncio
from playwright import async_api
from playwright.async_api import expect

async def run_test():
    pw = None
    browser = None
    context = None
    
    try:
        # Start a Playwright session in asynchronous mode
        pw = await async_api.async_playwright().start()
        
        # Launch a Chromium browser in headless mode with custom arguments
        browser = await pw.chromium.launch(
            headless=True,
            args=[
                "--window-size=1280,720",         # Set the browser window size
                "--disable-dev-shm-usage",        # Avoid using /dev/shm which can cause issues in containers
                "--ipc=host",                     # Use host-level IPC for better stability
                "--single-process"                # Run the browser in a single process mode
            ],
        )
        
        # Create a new browser context (like an incognito window)
        context = await browser.new_context()
        context.set_default_timeout(5000)
        
        # Open a new page in the browser context
        page = await context.new_page()
        
        # Navigate to your target URL and wait until the network request is committed
        await page.goto("http://localhost:5173", wait_until="commit", timeout=10000)
        
        # Wait for the main page to reach DOMContentLoaded state (optional for stability)
        try:
            await page.wait_for_load_state("domcontentloaded", timeout=3000)
        except async_api.Error:
            pass
        
        # Iterate through all iframes and wait for them to load as well
        for frame in page.frames:
            try:
                await frame.wait_for_load_state("domcontentloaded", timeout=3000)
            except async_api.Error:
                pass
        
        # Interact with the page elements to simulate user flow
        # -> Scroll down to inspect all sections for continuous dark mode consistency on desktop.
        await page.mouse.wheel(0, 1000)
        

        # -> Scroll further down to inspect the 'Diferenciais' section (3 cards) for continuous dark mode consistency on desktop.
        await page.mouse.wheel(0, 1000)
        

        # -> Scroll further down to inspect the 'Projetos' cards section for continuous dark mode consistency on desktop.
        await page.mouse.wheel(0, 1000)
        

        # -> Scroll further down to inspect the 'Planos' pricing section for continuous dark mode consistency on desktop.
        await page.mouse.wheel(0, 1000)
        

        # -> Scroll further down to inspect the final CTA and Footer sections for continuous dark mode consistency on desktop.
        await page.mouse.wheel(0, 1000)
        

        # -> Simulate mobile device viewport to verify continuous dark mode consistency on mobile.
        await page.goto('http://localhost:5173/', timeout=10000)
        await asyncio.sleep(3)
        

        await page.mouse.wheel(0, 1000)
        

        # -> Simulate mobile viewport to verify continuous dark mode consistency on mobile devices.
        await page.goto('http://localhost:5173/', timeout=10000)
        await asyncio.sleep(3)
        

        await page.mouse.wheel(0, 1000)
        

        # -> Simulate mobile viewport to verify continuous dark mode consistency on mobile devices.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click 'Agendar Reunião' to check interaction does not break dark mode
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div/section/div/div[3]/div/a').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Simulate mobile viewport to verify continuous dark mode consistency on mobile devices.
        await page.goto('http://localhost:5173/', timeout=10000)
        await asyncio.sleep(3)
        

        await page.mouse.wheel(0, 1000)
        

        await page.mouse.wheel(0, 1000)
        

        # -> Simulate mobile viewport to verify continuous dark mode consistency on mobile devices.
        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click 'Agendar Reunião' button to check interaction in mobile emulation
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div/section[8]/div/button').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Navigate to the landing page URL http://localhost:5173/ to restore test context and continue with mobile viewport simulation.
        await page.goto('http://localhost:5173/', timeout=10000)
        await asyncio.sleep(3)
        

        # -> Simulate mobile viewport to verify continuous dark mode consistency on mobile devices.
        await page.mouse.wheel(0, 1000)
        

        await page.mouse.wheel(0, 1000)
        

        await page.mouse.wheel(0, 1000)
        

        # -> Simulate mobile viewport to verify continuous dark mode consistency on mobile devices.
        await page.mouse.wheel(0, -1000)
        

        frame = context.pages[-1]
        # Click 'Ver Projetos' link to check mobile viewport dark mode consistency
        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div/section/div/div[3]/div/a').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)

title: TC002-Typography Hierarchy Verification
description: Check that typography sizes meet requirements, specifically that desktop titles range between 48px to 56px, ensuring visual hierarchy is consistent across the landing page.

            pass

                await frame.wait_for_load_state("domcontentloaded", timeout=3000)
            except async_api.Error:
                pass
        
        # Interact with the page elements to simulate user flow
        # -> Run Lighthouse audit on desktop for the landing page.
        frame = context.pages[-1]

        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div/div/section[7]/div/div[2]/div/button').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # -> Return to landing page at http://localhost:5173/ to retry or find alternative way to run Lighthouse audit.
        await page.goto('http://localhost:5173/', timeout=10000)
        await asyncio.sleep(3)
        

        # -> Run Lighthouse audit on desktop for the landing page.
        await page.goto('https://www.webpagetest.org/', timeout=10000)
        await asyncio.sleep(3)
        

        # -> Input landing page URL and configure test for desktop audit.

        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[3]/main/header/div/div/div/div[3]/div/div/form/div[2]/input').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.fill('http://localhost:5173/')
        

        frame = context.pages[-1]

        elem = frame.locator('xpath=html/body/div[3]/main/header/div/div/div/div[3]/div/div/form/div[3]/div[3]/div/div[2]/div').nth(0)
        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)

        await page.wait_for_timeout(3000); await elem.click(timeout=5000)
        

        # --> Assertions to verify final state

    finally:
